opinion.attorneys: Ronnie M. Mitchell, Coy E. Brewer, Jr., Fayetteville, for Britt.
opinion.opinion_text:
The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of September 2006 by Plaintiff for Extention of Time to File Brief:
Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Formyduval) shall have up to and including the 11th day of October 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of September 2006.
